org.springframework.data.convert

接口 ConverterBuilder.ReadingConverterBuilder<T,S>

  • 所有超级接口:
    ConverterBuilder, ConverterBuilder.ReadingConverterAware
    封闭接口:
    ConverterBuilder

    public static interface ConverterBuilder.ReadingConverterBuilder<T,S>
extends ConverterBuilder, ConverterBuilder.ReadingConverterAware
    Interface to represent an intermediate setup step of ConverterBuilder.ConverterAware defining a reading converter first.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.0

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.springframework.data.convert.ConverterBuilder

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      ConverterBuilder.ConverterAware andWriting(Function<? super S,? extends T> function)
      Creates a new ConverterBuilder.ConverterAware by registering the given Function to add a write converter.
